participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Private, adventurous, and creative with a love for music and fitness.
participant_1.background: I don't have a car but I do enjoy riding my bike. I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo. I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights. I am a very private person and do not discuss my family. I'm from LA, and I like to wear comfortable clothes because I'm always on the go.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Supportive, nurturing, and passionate about family and hobbies.
participant_2.background: I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters. I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind. I wait tables. The only autographs I have ever wanted are from authors.

content.text: Hello! I'm from LA, and I like to ride my bike. I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo. I listen to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights. I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.

Hello! I'm a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters. I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind. I also wait tables. The only autographs I have ever wanted are from authors.
What's your favorite Harry Potter book?
I love them all! But I think my favorite is The Prisoner of Azkaban.
What's your favorite thing about your family?
I love that they are always there for me.
What's your favorite thing to do in the winter?
I love to go ice skating.
Have you ever been ice fishing?
I have not! But I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! You should give it a try sometime.
